items.name: A Summer Of Drowning
items.desc:
SHIPPING INFO
A submerged and saturated India pale ale swamped under deep with all of the STRATA. Allowing this Indie Hop wonder to fly solo exposing a zingy flush of bitter pink grapefruit, zappy lemon crush and juicy chunk pineapple with dankadallic low notes of passion fruit pulp and strawberry smoothie.
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS / Ⓥ VEGAN FRIENDLY

items.name: Hickey The Rake
items.desc:
SHIPPING INFO
A Limonata Pale… An Ultra Pale which emulates almost toxic levels of citrus zing. A nuclear sherbet dib-dab of lemon, lime and tropical pineapple.
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS / Ⓥ  VEGAN FRIENDLY

items.name: Intercitra Overdrive
items.desc:
SHIPPING INFO
Exploiting CITRA to its farthest reach, a Double IPA of heady citradelic heights. Plumped up to busting point with body building grains and cereals then flushed out into the stratosphere using all known variants of the CITRA variety.
Brash, ballsy and bold with a brainwashing hash of lemon sherbet, bitter grapefruit zest, green pine shots, apricot flesh, passion fruit, mango pulp and desecrated pineapple.
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS / Ⓥ VEGAN FRIENDLY

items.name: Jakehead IPA
items.desc:
SHIPPING INFO
Supercharged India Pale Ale.... Rich/bright & amber/bronze with lots of American hop aroma. Distinctly bittersweet on the palate with a massive hop complexity fashioned deep within the IPA tradition.
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS / Ⓥ  VEGAN FRIENDLY

items.name: Macchiato
items.desc:
SHIPPING INFO
A complex grain bill for extra body and mouth feel round through this coffee porter that finds its way into our brew programme a couple of times per year. Lactose provides the smoothness for the cold brew hazelnut coffee to shine through. A staple favourite with many admirers of our brewery.
ALLERGENS: LACTOSE GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: My Garden Of Forking Paths
items.desc:
SHIPPING INFO
A mixed culture farmhouse ale of rustic proportion. Deep flaxen and soft with oats on body. Multiple barrel cultures blended with 2 Belgian Saison strains divert your senses beyond the orchard gate where ripeness lives. Musky peach flesh, sappy pear, spicy wheat and dried orange zest intermingle in harmony as the late summer sun slowly wanes away afar and yonder...
In my garden of forking paths, amongst change, I shall find you.
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS / Ⓥ  VEGAN FRIENDLY

items.name: Reflections In The Present
items.desc:
SHIPPING INFO
Starting with an undecorated grist of extra pale base malt, oats and wheat flakes producing an uncomplicated structure for a complex build.
A free rise fermentation using a classic farmhouse saison strain is then blended with 3 separate wild barrel fruit cultures. A 5 month fermentation / maturation period leaves us with a spritzed up funky midsummer smasher.
Blooming with crisp, clean cider barrel esters followed by a compounded admixture of acidic fresh orchard fruits.
Crab apple, white grape, peach flesh and tart lime zest intermingle with aseptic farmyard tannins resulting in a crisp and bracing sunshine quencher.
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS / Ⓥ  VEGAN FRIENDLY

items.name: Shouting At Strangers
items.desc:
SHIPPING INFO
A contemporary amber beer fermented with the unique Norwegian farmstead Hornindal Kveik strain. Fermented high to increase citrus ester intensity and spurred on with a whole cone kettle hop soak of Citra, Amarillo and Cascade. A late schedule addition of fresh zingy orange zest brings together a subtle, soft resinous finale on this sun setting quencher.
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS / Ⓥ  VEGAN FRIENDLY

items.name: The Seat Beside The Dream
items.desc:
*WE SHIP ONCE A WEEK - ALL ORDERS RECEIVED BY MIDNIGHT ON A SUNDAY ARE DESPATCHED ON A MONDAY*
A riot time summer pale ale of intoxicant amplification. Cushioned with liquid spongiform and drooping with tropical ripeness due to a bountiful, open handed flux of vibrantly fresh STRATA and VIC SECRET.
Passion fruit meets pot apace with lavishly creamed strawberry, dank pineapple and fresh green pine. A fully loaded, crushable analeptic refresher for the dog days to come…
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS / Ⓥ  VEGAN FRIENDLY

items.name: Wylam Gold
items.desc:
SHIPPING INFO
THIS BEER IS FOR LOVERS OF CASK BEER... DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU ARE ONLY A FAN OF OUR HOP FORWARD BEERS!!!
So it took 20 years and a Global Pandemic to make this happen but FINALLY you can now enjoy Wylam Gold in a can! It's tough to get hold of a cask style beer in these unprecedented times and we know many of you love a good sessionable Golden Ale. So this is for you.
Brewed with all gold ingredients - Golden Promise Pale Malt, Golden Naked Oats, First Gold Hops, with a Willamette hop finish. Fresh, clean flavour with a hint of grapefruit citrus from the Willamette. A light spunding adds a gentle carbonation that helps carry it in the can... Unfined pours with a slight haze
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS / Ⓥ  VEGAN FRIENDLY
